executeVoucher(address,bytes,(uint256,ui.details: vouchers can only be executed once

params._destination: address that will execute the payload
params._payload: payload to be executed by destination
params._v: validity proof for this encoded voucher

returns._0: true if voucher was executed successfully

params._epoch: which epoch the voucher belongs to
params._input: which input, inside the epoch, the voucher belongs to

returns._0: position of that voucher on bitmask

getEpochNoticeLog2Size().notice: get log2 size of epoch notice memory range

getEpochVoucherLog2Size().notice: get log2 size of epoch voucher memory range

getNoticeMetadataLog2Size().notice: get log2 size of notice metadata memory range

getVoucherMetadataLog2Size().notice: get log2 size of voucher metadata memory range

isValidNoticeProof(bytes,bytes32,(uint25.notice: isValidNoticeProof reverts if the proof is invalid

isValidVoucherProof(bytes,bytes32,(uint2.notice: isValidVoucherProof reverts if the proof is invalid
